contents.EN: You are getting an office to start a business. It's a roughly 900ft^2 office, and you'd like to contract a company with companies to interiorize this office.</br></br>

But you don't have any knowledge about interior construction, so you found a rough price of the construction on the internet.  You’ve heard that the approximate cost of 900ft^2 of interior construction is about $40,000. But you've heard that it's not the exact amount because you didn’t show your office.</br></br>

Currently, you have about $90,000 in your pocket, excluding other costs. Interior construction is not mandatory, but it is certain that it will greatly improve the current state of the office.</br></br>

You are about to begin negotiations with interior contractors who are currently accessing the server. We will let you know how many interior companies you can negotiate with after we check the server. You can agree to negotiate with the interior company at any time, or you can break the negotiation. If you understand the above situation, press the Next button. Press the Next button to start a quick survey and we will let you know how many companies you can negotiate with after the survey.</br></br>
